wikipedia_page.main: Barry K. Jackson (9 August 1937 – 7 October 2019) was a rugby union international who represented England in 1970.

response: Charles Barry Jackson (2 February 1938 – 7 November 2021) was an English footballer who played as a defender, making 482 league appearances for York City.
